laboratory_examinations.findings: Infant's VDRL titer was 1:256; mother's titer was 1:4; father's titer was 1:64.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: VDRL titer decreased to 1:4 after 3 months and became 1:1 one year later.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Leukocytosis (WBC count 25.4 3109/L; normal, 3.9-10.6 3109/L), anemia (hemoglobin 10.5 g/dL; normal, 13.5-17.5 g/dL), thrombocytopenia (platelet count 108 3109/L; normal, 150-400 3109/L).
Raised aspartate aminotransferase of 75 U/L (normal, 0-34 U/L) and raised alanine aminotransferase of 474 U/L (normal, 0-36 U/L). Raised direct bilirubin of 1.7 mg/dL (normal, <0.2 mg/dL).
